Career Profile

Software Engineer with 4+ years of experience in full-stack development, specializing in .NET technologies, cloud platforms, and modern web frameworks. Currently pursuing a PhD in Computer Engineering with focus on Computer Intelligence and Machine Learning. Passionate about building scalable applications and leveraging data-driven solutions to solve complex business problems.
